title: Anton Krasov
subtitle: Android & Flutter Developer
description:
Android and Flutter developer with 9 years of engineering experience and product management skills. Contributed to multiple open-source projects and libraries. Worked closely with product and design teams of successful startups to develop new ideas and explore new opportunities, diving
into user experience analysis. Valued for a high speed that comes with experience.

items.title: Consultant at Wysefit.com
items.description:
Helped fitness tech startup to determine a product-market fit and develop a mobile app in 2 weeks. Built a competitive product with video streaming, subscription system, chat, and authentication features. Tech Stack: Flutter, Firebase, and mux.com.

App: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1479230988

items.title: Mobile Tech Lead at Streamlabs.com
items.description:
As one of the early employees had to solve a core business challenge of building a competitive live-streaming app. Developed a technology that granted streamers an opportunity to display webpage links during the stream, which is a core system for all Streamers widgets.

App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.streamlabs

Built a Streamlabsâ€™ side project DibDab: a TikTok clone with Twitch
clips. Created a video streaming solution, caching and complex
UI: https://apkpure.com/dibdab-top-clips-from-twitch/com.dibdab (the project was closed, so the app was removed from Google Play). Streamlabs was acquired by Logitech for $89M.

items.title: Mobile Tech Lead at Fotostrana.ru
items.description:
Managed a team of 3 developers to build a successful dating app with 5M downloads.

App:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.fotostrana.sweetmeet

items.title: Android Developer at MyTime.com
items.description:
Fully ported iOS consumer app to Android. Then developed a complex B2B app with a fully custom calendar feature. Got lots of experience with Offline first apps and backend data sync.

App:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.melianlabs.mytimescheduler

items.title: Android Developer at Attendify.com
items.description:
This is an events app builder, a great project where we had to build UI fully on the fly. Learned a lot about RxJava in this project. We had a team of only 2 developers and we built a full Android side from scratch.

Apps: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=KitApps,+Inc.

items.title: Android Developer at NcryptedCloud.com
items.description: Worked a lot with native code and different encryption libraries. Learned about cryptography, corporate sales, and support.

items.title: Android Developer at Softevol.com
items.description:
Built multiple apps as an outsourcing studio, including dating, VPN, and educational projects. Developed a ViewPager view by myself before it was created by Google for this project:
https://www.amazon.ca/softevol-amoeba/dp/B007N5AA3W.

AndroidSocialNetworks

Library for easy work with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and Google on Android
